name: La Bête
description:
Final year game by BSV Games! Comprised on Viv Lazareva, Shannon Munro-Oakley, and Bailey Lark. La Bête won the initial stages of the Tranzfuser competition and the team got the chance to showcase their game at EGX in London!

La Bête is a fast-paced 2-4 player digital board game where players take turns working their way around a board to collect fuel. However, one player is the killer! The killer must eliminate everyone on the board before the survivors have enough time to fuel their vehicle and escape! The players can collect special cards to stop the killer, or sabotage other survivors! Players can choose from a wide selection of characters and vehicles. The game is inspired by 80’s slasher movies, featuring a stylish 2.5D pixel art style.
